item.title: Home
item.description: 👋 Welcome This is my public Zettelkasten — a collection of notes, ideas, and references that I am comfortable sharing online.

item.title: We will be like cats to AI
item.description: We will be like cats to AI Granted it sounds stupid and out there, but with some people claiming that AI will want to get rid of us when it becomes vastly smarter then us - I just have to disagree.

item.title: Setup Guide
item.description: Setup Guide A GitHub account is required to use Quartz and Quartz Syncer. Set up Quartz first Quartz Syncer manages Quartz content from Obsidian.

item.title: Personalities change with age
item.description: Personalities change with age from study in source extroversion Extraversion split into two different subtraits - Social vitality: “corresponds more closely to traits like sociability, positive affect, gregariousness, and energy level” - Social dominance: “reflects such traits as dominance, independ...

item.title: Extraversion
item.description: Extroversion can be split into following (see Source): Social vitality: “corresponds more closely to traits like sociability, positive affect, gregariousness, and energy level” Social dominance: “reflects such traits as dominance, independence, and self-confidence, especially in social contexts” Rel...

item.title: Changing personality
item.description: Changing personality Can you really change your personality? Summary Yes personalities change with age With some protocols the big five traits can be changed Neuroticism is the most malleable of the traits, followed by extroversion Techniques Therapy - decreasing neuroticism, increasing extraversion...
